name: Visions: Prelude
description:
Visions: Prelude is an introduction into the world of 'Visions'. A robust living city that lives in the eye of the storm, contained from all sides by the darklands. A perpetually dark area filled with nothing but dark skies and sand.

Uncover the mystery of how the thriving city, with no connection to any worlds, continue to prosper.

Why do the Steel Arrows pass through the skies? And why do they exist?

As the most recent Steel Arrow falls to the ground, what lurks in the arrow's hull? You know what it is, don't you?

Visions: Prelude is an Experiment by Heart & Soul Games. Join us on our journey into interactive fiction. What you see before you is a prototype, just to get the word out.

A full 'Visions' desktop experience is set for development, based on your feed back. We look forward to what you have to say.

And remember,

"What did you hear?"
